Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class GameController extends Object implements Serializable
class that represents the controller of the game

    • onMessageReceived

      public void onMessageReceived(Message message)
      switch on game state based on the message received from the server
      Parameters:
      message - from the server (from a particular client)

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      checks if the game is already started (no more players can connect) or not
      Returns:
      true if the game is started, false otherwise

    • checkLoginNickname

      public boolean checkLoginNickname(String nickname, View view)
      checks the nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to be checked
      view - the view of the player who is logging in
      Returns:
      true is the nickname is valid, false otherwise

    • checkLoginNicknameReconnect

      public boolean checkLoginNicknameReconnect(String nickname, View view)
      checks the nickname of the reconnected client
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to be checked of reconnected client
      view - the view of the reconnected player who is logging in
      Returns:
      true is the nickname is valid, false otherwise

    • loginHandler

      public void loginHandler(String nickname, VirtualView virtualView)
      handles the login to the game when a new player joins to the game if he's the first player it asks the max number of players
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the client
      virtualView - of the client

    • checkTiles

      protected boolean checkTiles(Message message)
      checks if the tiles are removable from the board
      Parameters:
      message - received
      Returns:
      true if the tiles are removable, false otherwise

    • checkPosition

      protected boolean checkPosition(Message message)
      checks if the position column in the bookshelf is valid
      Parameters:
      message - received
      Returns:
      true if the position is valid, false otherwise

    • removeVirtualView

      public void removeVirtualView(String nickname)
      remove a player virtual view from the controller
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player to remove

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      delete the file game of the finished current game at the end or at login phase if is failed

    • broadcastingDisconnection

      public void broadcastingDisconnection(String nickname, boolean isStarted)
      send a message to all connected players to notify a disconnection of a player
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the disconnected player
      isStarted - true if the game is already started, false otherwise
